title: Personalized Wedding Gift for Couple, Custom Last Name Sign with Wedding Date, Farmhouse Pallet Sign for Bridal or Couples Shower Gift
description: Our signature wood family name sign features an elegant hand-drawn script font that beautifully commemorates the establishment of a family.   These unique one-of-kind signs make for an especially thoughtful wedding or anniversary gift, a stunning entryway statement and a treasured family heirloom.Each sign at Heritage Sign Co. is handcrafted by our family for your family in our Chicago workshop from locally sourced lumber.🖤 DETAILS:• Highest Quality Baltic Birch Wood• ½” Thick Backboards• ¼” Thick Precision Laser-Cut Lettering• Multiple Stain Options• Unpainted Natural Letters or Optional Painted Letter Upgrade• Sawtooth Hanger Included• 3 Sizes Available• 2 Wording Options Available, See Listing Photos🖤 3 SIZES AVAILABLE:• Small - 6 ¼” h x 23” w (name only, no established date)• Medium - 9 ⅜” h x 23” w• Large - 12 ½” h x 28” w🖤 2 WORDING OPTIONS AVAILABLE:We get it.  Not everyone loves the way their last name looks plural.  That's why we've created a new format available for you, offered in multiple products.  Please read through the listing photos to see how we will make your name plural.  If you don't like the way your name looks grammatically plural, you can add "Family".  The formatting for this alternative option is shown in our listing photos.You are welcome to choose between the default, "The (Last Name)s" "est (20XX)" or "The (Last Name) Family" "est (20XX)" with our alternative formatting.  For the latter, please mention this in your order notes to ensure accommodation.Please note, the small size does not include a date.🖤 PROOFS:Want to see your sign before it gets put into production?  No problem!  To add a proof to your order, simply add the digital proof listing below to your cart along with your wooden sign you would like to receive a digital proof of.  Please note that this will increase the production time of your order.  A full proof is a black & white digital PDF showcasing the exact way it will be cut with any thickening of lines and attachment of letters.  Please note that we provide proofs for customers who have placed orders and are unable to provide proofs for those who have not yet purchased.Digital Proof Add-On:https://www.etsy.com/listing/1217767575/digital-proof-add-on🖤 DIGITAL FILE OPTION:Don't need the sign, but would love a digital file of your name in this gorgeous calligraphy script to use in your other wedding decor?  No problem!  Select the digital file option and leave us a note for the dimensions and file format you would like and we can create your name in any size.  Please be specific if you want the full design with "est wedding year" and the "bars" adjacent to it or if you would just like your name.  We are happy to substitute wedding years for wedding dates as needed.If no specific details are given, by default we will send you the size large 28" x 12.5" digital file in PDF format.  If you do not include a wedding year or date we will omit those details and only send you the name i.e. The Johnsons.  Please note that we will send your digital fileto the email associated with your Etsy account.  Formats available include PDF, PNG, JPEG, SVG or AI.  Font is not editable in any format.  In AI (Adobe Illustrator) format the text will be vectorized and fully scalable.🌟 SHOP OUR OTHER BESTSELLING SIGNS! 🌟Our Botanical Frame Family Name Signhttps://www.etsy.com/listing/1001328656/round-family-last-name-sign-with?ref=shop_home_recs_3&pro=1&frs=1Our Modern Stylized Serif Typeface Family Name Signhttps://www.etsy.com/listing/1029262303/rustic-last-name-sign-for-unique-gift?ref=shop_home_active_1&pro=1&frs=1Our Vintage Typeface Family Name Signhttps://www.etsy.com/listing/1029225411/rustic-last-name-sign-for-unique-gift?ref=shop_home_active_2&pro=1&frs=1Our Round Wooden Monogram Wreathshttps://www.etsy.com/listing/1027200371/wooden-round-monogram-sign-with-wreath?ref=shop_home_recs_4&pro=1&frs=1Our Custom Wedding Guestbookhttps://www.etsy.com/listing/1015087275/custom-wedding-guest-book-decor-layered?ref=shop_home_recs_5&pro=1&frs=1🖤 FINE PRINT:Please note that each sign is made to order with natural wood.  Both wood grain and wood stain will vary from each individual sign.  This is a quality to be treasured for its uniqueness.Signs are stained on front and sides. Back is left unfinished with optional sawtooth hanger taped to back for install.  Many customers opt to instead use gorilla or 3M mounting tape for an easier install, and for this reason we do not attach the sawtooth hanger so that you have the option.We have several wonderful graphic designers that specifically design all personalized orders that are placed through HeritageSignCo. If you have a specific request (particularly regarding spelling or non-family names), you MUST leave a note on your order at checkout. If you placed your order and forgot to leave a note at checkout, please send us a message ASAP. Please note that personalized orders get made and pushed into production very quickly, so if you let us know post checkout, we cannot guarantee accommodation before the item goes into production.Most items are shipped UPS ground.  Please note that UPS will not ship to PO Boxes, please enter a valid street address at checkout.Handmade in America • Chicago ILHeritage Sign Co. © // Est. 2021 // All Rights Reserved

This is simply because we only work with minimal leather finishes to accentuate the hide grain's natural beauty and embrace the imperfect elegance of nature's intention. These finish types do not cover any imperfections such as bug bites, veins, fence scratches, and other markings that tell a story about the animal's life.- 𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐬 -MORE PRODUCTS:https://www.etsy.com/shop/PEGAILEARN MORE ABOUT LEATHER: Follow our founder on his social media accounts: @tanner.leathersteinLEATHER CARE: Truly luxurious leather showcases its preserved grain characteristics.The appearance of vein marks, minor scratches, variations in color and grain marks are not defects, in fact they are the hallmark of true artisan grade leathers.To ensure the care and longevity of your Pegai craft:ෆ Store in a cool, dry place.ෆ Avoid prolonged exposure to sunlight or rain.ෆ Wipe away excessive moisture with a soft dry cloth.BRAND'S STORY: PEGAI was established in 2017 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas. Their Chief Craftsman, Tanner Leatherstein, found that there is a lack of knowledge about leather in the general public. Not everyone knows how to assess if the leather is good or if it’s perfect for their needs. PEGAI addresses this problem in two ways.Through offering them examples of what good leather craftsmanship is under PEGAI. They created the brand to help people make a statement through premium leather goods in the most authentic and stylish way possible. Their hope is that people can enjoy leather in its natural beauty and lessen the gap between their expectations and experiences about leather.Through giving small craftsmen the opportunity to use the same leather that we use. PEGAI gave small craftsmen and hobbyists access to all of their unique, most beautiful, cleanest, and rarest leather hides. This is available in their other brand: Tannerstein.Thank you so much for visiting and please let us know if ever we can help you further!
